hiveArticle.title: Learning Photography and Editing
hiveArticle.body:
Today I have spent some time in learning photography and the art of editing. So the tips or learning which I have worked on in this image is to use the rule of third, i.e. trying to keep my subject in the points. One more tip was to keep the subject in a frame, I have not got any frame but the AloeVera plant acted as a frame for my subject.
 
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/lbegvhninb.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6, Editing in Snapseed
